Dr. T & the Women

Ano: 2000

IMDb ID: tt0205271

Classificação: 4.7

Sinopse: Dr. Sullivan ("Dr. T") Travis is a wealthy Dallas gynecologist for some of the wealthiest women in Texas who finds his idealist life beginning to fall apart, starting when his wife Kate suffers a nervous breakdown and is committed to the state mental hospital. Dr. T's eldest daughter Dee Dee is planning to go through with her approaching wedding despite the secret that she's a lesbian and is romantically involved with her maid of honor Marilyn. Dr T's youngest daughter Conni, is a conspiracy-theorist freak who has her own agenda to everything, while his loyal secretary Carolyn has romantic feelings for him which are not mutual. His sister-in-law Peggy meddles in every situation she encounters. Only one woman, golf instructor Bree, offers Dr. T any comfort or salvation.—Anonymous
